Package com.forgerock.reactive

Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    A functional interface similar to Runnable but allows throwing a checked exception.
    Completable
    Completable is used to communicates a terminated operation which doesn't produce a result.
    Completable.Emitter
    Adapts the streaming api to a callback one.
    Completable.Subscriber
    Subscriber is notified when the operation has been completed, successfully or not.
    Consumer<V>
    A functional interface (callback) that consumes a single value.
    ReactiveHandler<C,I,O>
    Handle the processing of an input in a given context and return the resulting output.
    Single<V>
    Single is a reactive-streams compatible promise.
    Single.Emitter<V>
    Adapts the streaming api to a callback one.
    Single.Subscriber<V>
    Subscriber is notified when the operation has been completed, successfully or not.
    Stream<V>
    Stream is a reactive-streams compliant way to chain operations and transformation on a stream of data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReactiveFilter<C,I1,O1,I2,O2>
    Filters and/or transforms the request and/or response of an exchange. +--------+ +---------+ ---> I1 ---> | | ---> I2 ---> | | | Filter | | Handler | <--- O1 --< | | <--- O2 <--- | | +--------+ +---------+ +--------+ +---------+ +---------+ ---> I1 ---> | One | ---> I2 ---> | AndThen | ---> I3 ---> | | | Filter | | Filter | | Handler | <--- O1 --< | | <--- O2 <--- | | <--- O3 ---< | | +--------+ +---------+ +---------+
    ReactiveFilter.SimpleReactiveFilter<C,I,O>
    A simple ReactiveHandler performing simple filtering without type transformation.
    RxJavaStreams
    Stream and Single implementations based on RxJava.
    ServerConnectionFactoryAdapter Deprecated
    ServerConnectionFactoryAdapter.ServerConnectionAdapter
    Adapt a ServerConnection to a Function compatible with TransportProvider.getLDAPListener(java.util.Set, Function, org.forgerock.util.Options).

Package com.forgerock.reactive Description

Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure.
